OpenBeta is not intended to be an official resource for Federal spending data. For official Federal Spending data, please visit USAspending.gov. An official website of the United States Government

About

This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for the Jekyll new theme at: jglovier / jekyll-new

You can find the source code for Jekyll at jekyll / jekyll

Visit Federal Spending Transparency to see the process for the implementation of the DATA Act requirements.
